descri:
A Christmas Play by Florence Brewer Boeckel Incidental Music by Daniel Batchellor
The general outline of the play is this: Santa Claus arrives in his sleigh and by the way of the chimney enters an American home where he is discovered as he is filling their stockings by a little boy and girl. Santa Claus agrees to take the two children with him on his Christmas eve journey around the world (England, France, Norway, Germany, Italy, Russia, ). He bundels them into his sleigh ans as they are drawn across the sky by the reindeer they sing, describing what they see below them. The play calls for a minimum of three adult characters and nine children. Only one adult and two children have speaking parts. A fourth adult character can be used to advantage, and as many cildren may take part as desired. 
Songs with written music: Around the world with Santa Claus, Loving hearts
title: Theatre play: "Around the world with Santa Claus"
publis: National Council for Prevention of War, 532-17th Street, N.W. Washington D.C.
losse: Theatre play Around the world with Santa Claus Brewer Boeckel Florence
